turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, I know you would like to earn your m turk reward today but I have a proposition for you that you may like to consider

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Whats that?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You have the opportunity to donate the money you earned to a noble cause called Save the Children. Any small amount of money can make a significant impact when thousands of people decide to donate.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What does this charity do specifically?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: As you likely know already, millions of children die from hunger each year. This organization promotes children's rights and helps support children in impoverished areas. Save the Children has helped many children already, and some of the success stories of Save the Children will truly make you wish to help this cause.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds like a really good cause.  How do I know the money gets to them?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team in charge of this study will collect the donations themselves and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What is my other option?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, you can choose any amount to donate. You can choose to keep the entire payment yourself or you can give all or some of your payment to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How about I do half and half!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You can do as you like, but keep in mind the success stories Save the Children could me risen tenfold if everyone maximized donations when provided an opportunity.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to do half and half please!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok that sounds good, you will just need to give a specific amount of donation at the end of the task. Since there is a 10 minimum chat turn, I can provide you other stores about Save the Children the researchers have provided. You do not need to change your donation amount if you do not want to though.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Can you tell me how long this organization has been around?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, this is a longstanding organization founded in 1919. You are able to sponsor children and help sustain their livelihood. You can personally protect children from the dangers of hunger and lack of education in underdeveloped countries

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Where is this organization based out of?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is a British organization with a great reputation. It is one of the most successful non-governmental organizations in the world

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do they have any US based locations?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: There us a separate organization called Save the Children USA that you can also research

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will have to do that.  Sounds like a good organization that I am happy to donate to
